# drawableRenderContextRasterSampleCount

**Instance Property**

The multisample antialiasing sample count used for rendering.

## Declaration

```swift
var drawableRenderContextRasterSampleCount: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you’re using multisample antialiasing, set the same value you attach to your Metal pipeline. [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/LayerRenderer] sets the value to 1 by default.



## Configurating the render context

- **drawableRenderContextStencilFormat**: The metal pixel format matching that of the stencil texture used in the layer renderer drawable’s render context.
